description:
The `IconButton` component automatically includes ink and a tooltip.
The tooltip will only be included if the `tooltipLabel` prop is given.

Any other props (such as style or event listeners) will also be
applied.

iconClassName.description: The className to use for rendering the `FontIcon`.

children.description: Any children to use to render the `FontIcon`.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the button.

disabled.description: Boolean if the button is disabled.

href.description: An optional href to convert the button into a link button.

onClick.description: An optional function to call when the button is clicked.

tooltipLabel.description:
An optional label to use if you would like a tooltip to display
on hover or touch hold.

tooltipPosition.description:
The position that the tooltip should be displayed relative to
the button.

tooltipDelay.description: An optional amount of delay before the tooltip appears.
